mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r, b.* from ( select BOARD_SUBJECT,SUBSTR(BOARD_CONTENT,instr(BOARD_CONTENT,#{keyword},1,1),LENGTH(BOARD_CONTENT)) BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_DATE,MEMBER_ID from BOARD where (BOARD_SUBJECT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or BOARD_CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or MEMBER_ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') and BOARD_CATEGORY = '0' order by BOARD_DATE desc)b ) where r < 6 order by r asc

select m.MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_PASSWORD,MEMBER_NAME,MEMBER_POWER ,MEMBER_POINT,MEMBER_ACT,REG_DATE from (select rownum r, b.* from ( select * from MEMBER where MEMBER_ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by MEMBER_ACT desc)b )m left outer join (select MEMBER_ID ,nvl(MAX(REG_DATE),null) REG_DATE from PORT_FEEDBACK group by MEMBER_ID) p on p.MEMBER_ID=m.MEMBER_ID where r < 6 order by r asc ,REG_DATE DESC

select * from (select rownum r, b.* from ( select BOARD_SUBJECT,SUBSTR(BOARD_CONTENT,instr(BOARD_CONTENT,#{keyword},1,1),LENGTH(BOARD_CONTENT)) BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_DATE,MEMBER_ID from BOARD where (BOARD_SUBJECT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or BOARD_CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or MEMBER_ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') and BOARD_CATEGORY = '1' order by BOARD_DATE desc)b ) where r < 6 order by r asc

select * from (select rownum r, b.* from ( select BOARD_SUBJECT,SUBSTR(BOARD_CONTENT,instr(BOARD_CONTENT,#{keyword},1,1),LENGTH(BOARD_CONTENT)) BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_DATE,MEMBER_ID from BOARD where (BOARD_SUBJECT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or BOARD_CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or MEMBER_ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') and BOARD_CATEGORY = '2' order by BOARD_DATE desc)b ) where r < 6 order by r asc

select * from (select rownum r, b.* from ( select PORT_ID,PORT_SUBJECT,PORT_CONTENT,PORT_REGIDATE from PORTFOLIO where PORT_SUBJECT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or PORT_CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by PORT_REGIDATE desc)b ) where r < 4 order by r asc
